sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"交通"之意。
means: communication ： 指邮电、无线电、铁路、公路等各种交通方式或媒介。
traffic ： 指来往的东西的情况，表示一种抽象概念的交通流动量。
transportation ： 指将乘客或货物从一处运到另一处，也可指交通运输工具。

sentence.Network_en: Normally, the transportation system in Paris carries 950,000 passengers a day.
sentence.Network_cn: 正常情况下，巴黎的交通系统每天运送95万乘客。

sentence.Network_en: The baggage was being rapidly stowed away for transportation.
sentence.Network_cn: 行李正在迅速装载等待运输。

sentence.Network_en: Oxfam may also help with the transportation of refugees.
sentence.Network_cn: 乐施会也会帮助运送难民。

encyclopedia.content: 读音 英音：[,trænspə'teiʃən]美音：[,trænspɚ'teʃən]词义 名词n. [U] 1. 运输；输送 2. 【美】运输工具；交通车辆 3. 运输业 4. 【主美】运费；锛埪每惋級交通费 5. 【史】流刑，流放相关 语法标注解释transport 及物动词vt 运送，运输，搬运 使心醉；使忘我；使激动 放逐，流放 名词n. 运输 交通运输系统 锛埦蔑級运输机，运输船 激情，狂喜

entry.def: Transportation refers to any type of vehicle that you can travel in or carry goods in.

entry.tran: 交通运输系统;公共交通(网)
entry.def: Transportation is a system for taking people or goods from one place to another, for example using buses or trains.

example.ex: Campuses are usually accessible by public transportation.
example.tran: 通常乘坐公共交通即可到达各个校区。
我们国家的交通运输政策

entry.def: Transportation is the activity of taking goods or people from one place to another in a vehicle.

example.ex: The baggage was being rapidly stowed away for transportation…
example.tran: 行李正在迅速装载等待运输。

example.ex: Oxfam may also help with the transportation of refugees.
example.tran: 乐施会也会帮助运送难民。

means.word_mean: 1. a facility consisting of the means and equipment necessary for the movement of passengers or goods
2. the act of transporting something from one location to another
3. the sum charged for riding in a public conveyance
4. the commercial enterprise of transporting goods and materials
5. the act of expelling a person from their native land;

sentences.sentence: "the sentence was one of transportation for life"

auth_sentence.content: Transportation will be expensive for the low density material.
auth_sentence.res_content: Transportation will be expensive for the low density material.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Transportation will be expensive for the low density material.

auth_sentence.content: Rescue efforts are being hampered by lack of transportation.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rescue efforts are being hampered by lack of transportation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rescue efforts are being hampered by lack of transportation.

auth_sentence.content: Roads will face competition from other modes of transportation.
auth_sentence.res_content: Roads will face competition from other modes of transportation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Roads will face competition from other modes of transportation.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 比例的, 成比例的, 相称的, 均衡的
stems_affixes.word_buile: proportion比例;均衡+al……的→adj.比例的, 成比例的, 相称的, 均衡的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 重要的, 重大的, 有权力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: import要旨,含意+ant……的→adj.重要的, 重大的, 有权力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 轻便的,手提[式]的,可移动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: port拿,运+able能……的→adj.轻便的,手提[式]的,可移动的
dis不+proportion[n.比例;部分;均衡,相称]+al……的→adj.&n.不均衡, 不成比例 v.使不均衡, 使不对称

stems_affixes.value_cn: 按比例地, 相配合地;适当地
stems_affixes.word_buile: proportional比例的+ly表副词→adv.按比例地, 相配合地;适当地
port部分,分开+ion表名词→一部分
pro多+port部分,分开+ion→多个部分,每部分占用一定比例
comport[v.举止,行为]+ment表名词→n.举止
deport[v.驱逐出境]+ation表名词→n.移送,充军,放逐
de加强+port拿,运+ment表名词→一个人所拿[带的]的举止
ex出+port港口→出港口→出口
im进入+port港口→进港→进口,传达意义
import传达意义+ance表名词→带有意义的状态→重要性
port拿,运→拿或运东西的地方→港口,舱门
port拿,运+age费用→运费

stems_affixes.value_cn: 守门人,门房,行李搬运工,服务员
stems_affixes.word_buile: port拿,运+er人→n.守门人,门房,行李搬运工,服务员
port拿,运+folio树叶,页→拿树叶,书页的东西→文件夹
pur=per全部+port拿,运→全部拿到一起→要领,意义
s=dis+port传递→原为一种游戏
sport运动+s+man人→n.运动家, 冒险家

stems_affixes.value_cn: 运输;运输系统,运载工具
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans转移+port搬运→搬运转移→运输
transport运输,运送+ation表名词→n.运输,运送,客运
dis分开+port拿,运→拿来分心的东西→娱乐
ex出+port港口→出港口→出口
im进入+port港口→进港→进口,传达意义

stems_affixes.value_cn: 报告, 传说,报到, 告发
stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+port带→把[消息,情况]带回
ap成为+port部分,分开+ion表名词→把整体分成部分→分配

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使不均衡, 使不对称
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis不+proportion[n.比例;部分;均衡,相称]+al……的→adj.&n.不均衡, 不成比例 v.使不均衡, 使不对称
com共同+port拿,引申为动作→一个人的全部动作
de去掉+port拿,运→拿出去→放逐
sup下面+port带→带来支持
trans转移+port搬运→搬运转移→运输

Sentence.sentence: Inefficient harvesting, inadequate local transportation and poor infrastructure (基础设施)mean that produce is frequently handled inappropriately and stored under unsuitable farm site conditions.
Poor practices in harvesting, storage and transportation have resulted in a waste of much of the food we produce and thus a waste of land and resources
The author moved from Manhattan to rural Japan partly because he could live without modern transportation.

sentences.en: The transportation of goods by air costs a lot.
sentences.cn: 航空运输货物花费很高。

sentences.en: The transportation took off with its cargo at midnight.
sentences.cn: 运输机载着货物深夜起飞了。

sentences.en: In the past, British convicts could be sentenced to transportation.
sentences.cn: 过去, 英国的囚犯可能会被判流放。

jushi.english: My husband is using my car,so I have no means of transportation.
jushi.chinese: 我先生在用我的车,所以我没有交通工具。

jushi.english: In the past,British convicts could be sentenced to transportation.
jushi.chinese: 过去,英国的囚犯可能会被判流放。

jushi.english: The transportation took off with its cargo at midnight.
jushi.chinese: 运输机载着货物,深夜起飞了。
